description:
Are you tired of making money for someone else? Have you always wanted to work from home? Like many Americans maybe you don't think you will have enough money to retire on. This is an ideas course. I'll show you little known techniques for creating profitable ideas. You'll even learn ways to overcome mental blocks to your idea creation.

You will also see links to dozens of web businesses that people like you created to provide part time and full time work at home jobs. The instructor has had over 40 years of experience helping other people with home business ideas.. Very few educational institutes teach tecnniques like this, yet they are simple to use and apply.
title: Fire Your Boss - Work at Home
